sentence.Network_en: They were disorientated by the smoke and were firing blindly into it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在烟雾中迷失了方向，向里面胡乱射击了一通。

sentence.Network_en: Don't blindly trust in the good faith of any government official.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要盲目信任任何政府官员的诚意。

sentence.Network_en: Without adequate information, many students choose a college almost blindly.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为缺少足够的信息，许多学生都是近乎盲目地选择大学。

是一味(Blindly)可能美容的瓜菜，世上本没有好帖，顶的人多了就成了好贴。被称为“厨房里的美容(Cosmetology)剂”，我不是天桥上算 …

盲从  follow blindly 表示个人行为的道德概念。指不问是非、不辨真伪、消极顺应、盲目随从别人。...盲从是缺乏知识水平和道德水平的表现。盲从者没有主见,人云亦云.
blindly是什么意思_blindly的翻译_音标... ... follow blindly1.  盲从 blindly pursue1. 盲目追求 worship blindly1.  盲目崇拜.

entry.def: If you say that someone does something blindly, you mean that they do it without having enough information, or without thinking about it.

example.ex: Don't just blindly follow what the banker says...
example.tran: 不要盲目听信银行家的话。

example.ex: Without adequate information, many students choose a college almost blindly.
example.tran: 因为缺少足够的信息，许多学生都是近乎盲目地选择大学。

means.word_mean: 2. without preparation or reflection; without a rational basis;

auth_sentence.content: Thus, we cannot blindly rely on mathematics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus, we cannot blindly rely on mathematics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus, we cannot blindly rely on mathematics.

auth_sentence.content: Blindly taking initial withdrawal plus inflation is not prudent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blindly taking initial withdrawal plus inflation is not prudent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blindly taking initial withdrawal plus inflation is not prudent.

auth_sentence.content: Blindly trust us as we trusted our science teachers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blindly trust us as we trusted our science teachers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blindly trust us as we trusted our science teachers.

sentences.en: Never copy foreign things blindly or mechanically.
sentences.cn: 绝不能盲目或机械地照搬外国的东西。

sentences.en: I just hit out blindly in all directions.
sentences.cn: 我只是向四方乱击一通。

sentences.en: It wasn’t in his nature to follow blindly.
She fired blindly into the mass of shadows.
sentences.cn: 她对着大片阴影胡乱射击。

sentences.en: He stumbled blindly on through the dark building.
sentences.cn: 他摸索着跌跌撞撞地穿过漆黑的建筑物。

sentences.en: She groped blindly for the door handle.
She pushed blindly past him and made for the door.
sentences.cn: 她摸索着从他身边挤过去走向门口。

sentences.en: The passage ended blindly fifty feet away.
sentences.cn: 那条通道在五十英尺外突然中断了。
